cleaned_text: What Customers Say Delighted with my order. Beautifully packaged. I loved the personally written blessings card and free gift. Thank you for my order your very good and the way it was wrapped and your beautiful card and gift. It was a lovely surprise x Just received my package this morning and I'm in love with them all especially my gypsy earrings thanks Jenny highly recommend your jewellery xxx What a beautiful place to shop, 5 star service, a must all year round:) Lovely products and so lovely to deal with. High quality items, great value for money and an amazing place to shop for all your Zen/ Meditation needs! No hassle shopping experience. Oh my word!! Absolutely thrilled with the goddess Crystal!! Thank you for the extra gift. Wonderfully packaged, and quick delivery.. Once again thank you so much!! Maryellen Antley xx My beautiful pendent arrived and I love it. It was packed amazing made me smile when I saw it. I would highly recommend this company and will be buying from it again. Thanks Opening my parcel gave me a warm fuzzy glow. So much effort and detail put into everything. I love my Chakra Bracelet x. Thanks for my beautiful pendant it arrived the next day. The packaging was super cute I was showered in glitter when I opened it. I look forward to buying again. I received my order in the post this morning. It was beautifully wrapped and came with a lovely, personalised note to me with a cheering and inspirational message. I have already recommended this lovely shop to my friends and will definitely be buying from here again. Best of luck with your new shop. Light and blessings Great shop to deal with. Jenny is a gem herself. The crystals that I bought had lovely clear energy xx. Everything I got was perfect .. Great page to deal with , I'd highly recommend it !
